import * as React from "react"; import { useCart } from "../context/CartContext"; const Cart = () => { const { cart } = useCart(); const { removeItem } = useCart(); const {clear} = useCart(); console.log(cart) let subtotal = 0; for (let i = 0; i < cart.length; i++) { subtotal += parseInt(cart[i].price * cart[i].qty); }; let envio = subtotal * 1.15; let total = subtotal + envio; return ( <>
{cart?.map((item) => { return ( ` ` ) })}
Producto Disponibilidad Cantidad Precio Total
${item.title} En stock $${item.price} {${item.qty}*${item.price}}
Sub-Total {subtotal}
Env√≠o {envio}
Total {total}
Continuar Comprando
Finalizar Compra
); }; export default Cart;
